00001 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00002 ! Subroutine : Update
00003 ! Revision   : 1.1 (2008-11-10)

00028 
00029  SUBROUTINE Update
00030 
00031 ! Common Variables
00032  USE Domain
00033  USE FluidParams, ONLY : p, p_f, u, u_f
00034  IMPLICIT NONE
00035 
00036 ! Local Variables
00037  INTEGER :: i, j, xs1, xs2, ys1, ys2, xt1, xt2, xt3, yt1, yt2, yt3
00038 
00039 !--------- Interpolation of velocity and pressure on the order parameter mesh --
00040  DO j = yl, yu-1
00041    DO i = xl, xu-1
00042 
00043 ! Coordinates of source nodes for the interpolation (xs,ys)
00044      xs1 = i
00045      ys1 = j
00046      xs2 = ni(i,j,1)
00047      ys2 = ni(i,j,2)
00048 
00049 ! Coordinates of target nodes for the interpolation (xt,yt)
00050      xt1 = 2*i - 1
00051      yt1 = 2*j - 1
00052      xt2 = ni_f(xt1,yt1,1)
00053      yt2 = ni_f(xt1,yt1,2)
00054      xt3 = ni_f(xt2,yt2,1)
00055      yt3 = ni_f(xt2,yt2,2)
00056  
00057 ! Target 1
00058      u_f(xt1,yt1,1) = u(xs1,ys1,1)
00059      u_f(xt1,yt1,2) = u(xs1,ys1,2)
00060      p_f(xt1,yt1)   = p(xs1,ys1)
00061 
00062 ! Target 2
00063      u_f(xt2,yt1,1) = 0.5D0*( u(xs1,ys1,1) + u(xs2,ys1,1) )
00064      u_f(xt2,yt1,2) = 0.5D0*( u(xs1,ys1,2) + u(xs2,ys1,2) )
00065      p_f(xt2,yt1)   = 0.5D0*( p(xs1,ys1)   + p(xs2,ys1) )
00066 
00067 ! Target 3
00068      u_f(xt3,yt1,1) = u(xs2,ys1,1)
00069      u_f(xt3,yt1,2) = u(xs2,ys1,2)
00070      p_f(xt3,yt1)   = p(xs2,ys1)
00071 
00072 ! Target 4
00073     u_f(xt1,yt2,1) = 0.5D0*( u(xs1,ys1,1) + u(xs1,ys2,1) )
00074     u_f(xt1,yt2,2) = 0.5D0*( u(xs1,ys1,2) + u(xs1,ys2,2) )
00075     p_f(xt1,yt2)   = 0.5D0*( p(xs1,ys1)   + p(xs1,ys2) )
00076 
00077 ! Target 5
00078     u_f(xt2,yt2,1) = 0.25D0*( u(xs1,ys1,1) + u(xs2,ys1,1) + u(xs1,ys2,1) + u(xs2,ys2,1) )
00079     u_f(xt2,yt2,2) = 0.25D0*( u(xs1,ys1,2) + u(xs2,ys1,2) + u(xs1,ys2,2) + u(xs2,ys2,2) )
00080     p_f(xt2,yt2)   = 0.25D0*( p(xs1,ys1)   + p(xs2,ys1)   + p(xs1,ys2)   + p(xs2,ys2) )
00081 
00082 ! Target 6
00083     u_f(xt3,yt2,1) = 0.5D0*( u(xs2,ys1,1) + u(xs2,ys2,1) )
00084     u_f(xt3,yt2,2) = 0.5D0*( u(xs2,ys1,2) + u(xs2,ys2,2) )
00085     p_f(xt3,yt2)   = 0.5D0*( p(xs2,ys1)   + p(xs2,ys2) )
00086 
00087 ! Target 7
00088     u_f(xt1,yt3,1) = u(xs1,ys2,1)
00089     u_f(xt1,yt3,2) = u(xs1,ys2,2)
00090     p_f(xt1,yt3)   = p(xs1,ys2)
00091 
00092 ! Target 8
00093     u_f(xt2,yt3,1) = 0.5D0*( u(xs1,ys2,1) + u(xs2,ys2,1) )
00094     u_f(xt2,yt3,2) = 0.5D0*( u(xs1,ys2,2) + u(xs2,ys2,2) )
00095     p_f(xt2,yt3)   = 0.5D0*( p(xs1,ys2)   + p(xs2,ys2) )
00096 
00097 ! Target 9
00098     u_f(xt3,yt3,1) = u(xs2,ys2,1)
00099     u_f(xt3,yt3,2) = u(xs2,ys2,2)
00100     p_f(xt3,yt3)   = p(xs2,ys2)
00101 
00102    END DO
00103  END DO
00104 
00105 ! Update leftmost f values which are outside this processor's momentum grid
00106  DO j = yl, yu-1
00107 
00108 ! Coordinates of source nodes for the interpolation (xs,ys)
00109    xs1 = xlg
00110    ys1 = j
00111    xs2 = xl
00112    ys2 = ni(xlg,j,2)
00113 
00114 ! Coordinates of target nodes for the interpolation (xt,yt)
00115    xt1 = xl_f
00116    yt1 = 2*j - 1
00117    yt2 = ni_f(xt1,yt1,2)
00118    yt3 = ni_f(xt1,yt2,2)
00119 
00120 ! Target 2
00121    u_f(xt1,yt1,1) = 0.5D0*( u(xs1,ys1,1) + u(xs2,ys1,1) )
00122    u_f(xt1,yt1,2) = 0.5D0*( u(xs1,ys1,2) + u(xs2,ys1,2) )
00123    p_f(xt1,yt1)   = 0.5D0*( p(xs1,ys1)   + p(xs2,ys1) )
00124 
00125 ! Target 5
00126    u_f(xt1,yt2,1) = 0.25D0*( u(xs1,ys1,1) + u(xs2,ys1,1) + u(xs1,ys2,1) + u(xs2,ys2,1) )
00127    u_f(xt1,yt2,2) = 0.25D0*( u(xs1,ys1,2) + u(xs2,ys1,2) + u(xs1,ys2,2) + u(xs2,ys2,2) )
00128    p_f(xt1,yt2)   = 0.25D0*( p(xs1,ys1)   + p(xs2,ys1)   + p(xs1,ys2)   + p(xs2,ys2) )
00129 
00130 ! Target 8
00131    u_f(xt1,yt3,1) = 0.5D0*( u(xs1,ys2,1) + u(xs2,ys2,1) )
00132    u_f(xt1,yt3,2) = 0.5D0*( u(xs1,ys2,2) + u(xs2,ys2,2) )
00133    p_f(xt1,yt3)   = 0.5D0*( p(xs1,ys2)   + p(xs2,ys2) )
00134  END DO
00135 
00136 ! Update lowermost f values which are outside this processor's momentum grid
00137  DO i = xl, xu-1
00138 
00139 ! Coordinates of source nodes for the interpolation (xs,ys)
00140    xs1 = i
00141    ys1 = ylg
00142    xs2 = ni(i,ylg,1)
00143    ys2 = yl
00144 
00145 ! Coordinates of target nodes for the interpolation (xt,yt)
00146    xt1 = 2*i - 1
00147    yt1 = yl_f
00148    xt2 = ni_f(xt1,yt1,1)
00149    xt3 = ni_f(xt2,yt1,1)
00150 
00151 ! Target 4
00152    u_f(xt1,yt1,1) = 0.5D0*( u(xs1,ys1,1) + u(xs1,ys2,1) )
00153    u_f(xt1,yt1,2) = 0.5D0*( u(xs1,ys1,2) + u(xs1,ys2,2) )
00154    p_f(xt1,yt1)   = 0.5D0*( p(xs1,ys1)   + p(xs1,ys2) )
00155 
00156 ! Target 5
00157    u_f(xt2,yt1,1) = 0.25D0*( u(xs1,ys1,1) + u(xs2,ys1,1) + u(xs1,ys2,1) + u(xs2,ys2,1) )
00158    u_f(xt2,yt1,2) = 0.25D0*( u(xs1,ys1,2) + u(xs2,ys1,2) + u(xs1,ys2,2) + u(xs2,ys2,2) )
00159    p_f(xt2,yt1)   = 0.25D0*( p(xs1,ys1)   + p(xs2,ys1)   + p(xs1,ys2)   + p(xs2,ys2) )
00160 
00161 ! Target 6
00162    u_f(xt3,yt1,1) = 0.5D0*( u(xs2,ys1,1) + u(xs2,ys2,1) )
00163    u_f(xt3,yt1,2) = 0.5D0*( u(xs2,ys1,2) + u(xs2,ys2,2) )
00164    p_f(xt3,yt1)   = 0.5D0*( p(xs2,ys1)   + p(xs2,ys2) )
00165  END DO
00166 
00167 ! Update leftmost f values which are outside this processor's momentum grid
00168 ! Coordinates of source nodes for the interpolation (xs,ys)
00169  xs1 = xlg
00170  ys1 = ylg
00171  xs2 = xl
00172  ys2 = yl
00173 
00174 ! Coordinates of target nodes for the interpolation (xt,yt)
00175  xt1 = xl_f
00176  yt1 = yl_f
00177 
00178 ! Target 5
00179  u_f(xt1,yt1,1) = 0.25D0*( u(xs1,ys1,1) + u(xs2,ys1,1) + u(xs1,ys2,1) + u(xs2,ys2,1) )
00180  u_f(xt1,yt1,2) = 0.25D0*( u(xs1,ys1,2) + u(xs2,ys1,2) + u(xs1,ys2,2) + u(xs2,ys2,2) )
00181  p_f(xt1,yt1)   = 0.25D0*( p(xs1,ys1)   + p(xs2,ys1)   + p(xs1,ys2)   + p(xs2,ys2) )
00182 
00183  RETURN
00184  END SUBROUTINE Update
Generated on Mon Nov 10 16:42:56 2008 for ZSC-2D-DGR-MPI by  1.5.6
